categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Cruuz was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate that saw service with the the Rebel Alliance Fleet during the height of the Galactic Civil War. The warship was destroyed by Imperial forces at the Battle of the Bajic Shipyards.
It is possible to save the Cruuz in the game, but the player must engage in combat with the Imperial warships in order to do so.
